text: The Beishan Broadcasting Wall () is a propaganda loudspeaker in Jinning Township, Kinmen, Taiwan. ==History== The structure was built in 1967 as a physiological Cross-Strait warfare instrument directed towards Mainland China. ==Technical specifications== The structure consists of 48 speakers which faces the ocean. ==See also== * Mashan Broadcasting and Observation Station ==References== Category:Buildings and structures in Kinmen County Category:Loudspeakers Category:Propaganda in Taiwan Category:Walls in Taiwan
title: Beishan Broadcasting Wall
